formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: The van't Hoff factor (i) is calculated using the formula: i = \frac{\text{number of particles in solution after dissociation}}{\text{number of formula units initially dissolved}}

variables.meaning: property tax (annual or monthly depending on input)
